title: Manage Commercial Property Maintenance
description: The property manager for a retail center needs to schedule quarterly HVAC servicing for all tenant units.

tasks.description: Identify all properties that require quarterly HVAC servicing from the asset management plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of all retail units at the center.

tasks.description: Create a master work order for the HVAC vendor for the quarterly service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive work order covering all units.

tasks.description: Coordinate with tenants to provide the HVAC vendor access to their units over a specific week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully communicates the schedule to all affected tenants.
